alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 12 at 4:56PM CDT until May 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT/645 PM CDT/ FOR CHEYENNE...RAWLINS...DECATUR COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS AND SOUTHEASTERN DUNDY COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN NEBRASKA... At 355 PM MDT/455 PM CDT/, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 5 miles west of Culbertson to 6 miles east of Haigler, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Highway cameras showing a wall of dust in Benkelman Nebraska. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Highway 36 and secondary roadways will be impacted. Locations impacted include... Oberlin, St. Francis, Atwood, Benkelman, Bird City, McDonald and Norcatur. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
